name: Stargazer program
description: Dueling pvp, shoot em up. Face your opponents head on, trade bullets and blast them across the universe.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.8 Ghz or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon™ HD 6450 or higher DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 2.4 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon™ HD 6450 or higher DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
